title: Angry Dad
description: The semi-autobiographical web cartoon created by Bart Simpson. Later turned into an Oscar-winning animated short.
altHero: a poorly drawn Homer Simpson looks angry as he sits on a recliner
alt1: Homer reads the paper and is so angry his head expands and eyes pop out
alt2: Homer peers into a ketchup bottle and a wave of ketchup engulfs his head
alt3: Homer yells in frustration at the nuclear plant as a mushroom cloud emerges in the distance
alt4: Homer walks down the sidewalk at night and is stuck in the eye by the crescent moon
